message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm sure you'll love.
I'm really interested in the product, but $120 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $80.
Thank you for your offer, Bob! I understand that $120 might be a bit steep for you. However, I'm willing to meet you in the middle. I can offer it to you for $100.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me in the middle, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $90?
I understand that you're trying to stay within your budget, Bob. I'm willing to make another concession. I can offer it to you for $95.
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but $95 is still a bit too high for me. Would you be willing to go down to $85?
I'm starting to get a bit concerned that we might not meet in the middle, Bob. However, I'm still willing to make another concession. I can offer it to you for $92.
I appreciate your continued willingness to negotiate, but $92 is still a bit too high for me. Would you be willing to go down to $88?
I'm getting close to my minimum acceptable price, Bob. I can offer it to you for $90.
I'm willing to meet you in the middle, Alice. I'll pay $87.50 for the product. This is my final offer.
